entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
